info.name: CurrencyXchange
info.description:
## CurrencyXchange
### This application provides the users the platform to exchange the currency
**The app provides the following services through API's.**
- Users can sign-up/login.
- Users can upload profile_pic.
- Users can add/withdraw funds to/from the account.
- Users can convert the currency.
- Users can transfer the currency.

request.description: ### Will use this API for daily conversion rates as it is responsive.

### This API will be used for fetching the live rates

- we can hit 100 api per hour so be carefull.
- or create multiple keys for now.

response.name: live rates available countries list

request.description: # Not using this API as observed it is that seomtime the api doesn't responds.

# Not Using This API as we don't have base currency feature.
### This API will be used for updating the daily base rates for currency conversion.

### User can use this API to register his self with the platform.
- There are two mandatory fields.
    - username and password.
    - username should be unique.
    - password should be of at least 8 characters.
- There are other optional fields.
    - email, first_name, last_name.

response.name: minimum password length check
username exists issue

request.description:
### This API will be used to log in the user to the platform.
- only two parameters are required.
    - username and password.
    - after successful authentication, it will return the token key to perform other actions.

response.name: wrong credentials

request.description: ### This API should be used to upload the profile pic of the user.
### It fetches the profile pic of the user.
### This API can be used to fetched the preferred_currency and balances in the wallet

### This API will be used to create the wallet of a user.
- if provided with preferred currency it will create the balance in the preferred currency.
- else it will set default currency as "INR"
### Fetches the balances of user

### This API will be used to create the create the balance under wallet of a user.
- valid currency is required

response.name: Currency not active

request.description:
### This API will be used adding the funds in the user wallet.
- amount and currency should be provided.
- if provided currency not present in the wallet then it will be created.

### This API will be used withdrawing the funds in the user wallet.
- amount and currency should be provided.

### This API can be use to convert the funds to other currencies.
- It requires three parameters.
    - from_currency, to_currency, amount

### This API can be use to convert the funds to other currencies.
- It requires three parameters.
    - from_currency, to_currency, amount

response.name: transfer-funds same user provided in to_username

request.description:
### This API fetches the active currencies from the system
- as of now we don't provide the facilities for all the currencies.
- this api will return the active currencies and symbols.

### This API fetches the active currencies from the system
- as of now we don't provide the facilities for all the currencies.
- this api will return the active currencies and symbols.
# This API fetches the live rates of the currency.

### This API is used to fetch the financial summarization.
- currency, type, total_amount, number_of_transactions, avg_amount
